## Introduction

This week will introduce how to deal with imbalanced data in machine learning classifcation tasks.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the types and issue of imbalanced data.
2. Understand the classic methods to handle imbalanced data.
